text: Salguero is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Carlos Salguero (1955–2006), Argentine footballer *Elizabeth Salguero (born 1964), Bolivian politician *Felipe Salguero, Mexican professional boxer *Gabriel Salguero, Argentinian footballer *Gerónimo Salguero (1774—1847), Argentine statesman and lawyer *Gloria Salguero Gross (1941–2015), Salvadoran politician and businesswoman *Gustavo Adolfo Espina Salguero (born 1946), Guatemalan politician *José Antonio Salguero (born 1960), Spanish footballer *Laura Salguero (born 1978), Spanish footballer *Olinda Salguero (born 1984), Guatemalan activist *Rafael Salguero (born 1946), Guatemalan football administrator *Salvador Salguero (swimmer) (born 1967), Salvadoran swimmer
title: Salguero
